result_list.explanation: This stage direction describes a character action that is a movement (pointing with the foot).
This stage direction describes a general character action (kneeling).
This stage direction indicates that a character exits ('en dehors' means 'outside').
result_list.stgdir: Elle frappe à la porte en dehors.

result_list.explanation: This stage direction describes a general character action (eating).
This stage direction describes a character movement (sitting on a chair).
result_list.stgdir: S'asseyant sur une chaise près de la table à gauche.

result_list.explanation: This stage direction indicates that a character exits ('sortir' means 'to leave').
This stage direction describes an interaction with an object (pulling a cord).
result_list.stgdir: Il tire le cordon de la sonnette.

result_list.explanation: This stage direction describes a violent action (drawing a sword).
This stage direction describes a non-verbal interaction (pointing at someone).
This stage direction describes a delivery manner (changing tone to supplication).
